    http://www.modeldev.restauranttechnologynetwork.com/models/v3

    Facet Promotion_Summary

      • http://www.modeldev.restauranttechnologynetwork.com/models/v3:Promotion_Summary

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<ms-0300:Promotion xmlns:ms-0300="http://www.modeldev.restauranttechnologynetwork.com/models/v3">
    <ms-0300:PromotionCode>Promo1</ms-0300:PromotionCode>
    <ms-0300:Description>School fundraiser</ms-0300:Description>
</ms-0300:Promotion>

      Example JSON

      {
  "Promotion" : {
    "PromotionCode" : "Promo1",
    "Description" : "School fundraiser"
  }
}

      • Property Summary

        Properties 
        Name Description
        PromotionCode
        A code that the guest provides to invoke a discount on the menu product (e.g. promotion, charity event).
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:string
        Example Value Promo1
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        Description
        Provides a description of the promotion or charity event identified in the promotion code.
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:string
        Example Value School fundraiser
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
